name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Mindful Crafting: Relaxation in the Digital Age
base_name: Student Taught Courses (StuCo): Mindful Crafting: Relaxation in the Digital Age
long_desc: In a hyperconnected digital world, crafting has emerged as both an online and offline practice that fosters mindfulness, creativity, and community. From diamond painting to digital scrapbooking, this course explores how craftingboth physical and virtualenhances focus, reduces stress, and cultivates mindfulness.Students will engage in handson crafting, explore digital crafting communities YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Reddit, etc., and study the psychology behind creative flow states through handson projects and inclass discussions. By the end of the course, students will develop their own mindful craft project. Course fee 5

custom_fields.goals: By the end of this course, students will be able toRecognize the importance of mental wellbeing through mindfulness activities, such as crafting.Analyze the impact of social media on the spread of DIY crafting trends.Explore the cognitive and psychological benefits of handson crafting.Develop and present their own craft projects while incorporating knowledge from class discussions.
custom_fields.key_topics:
The Role of Crafting in Well-Being
Digital Crafting & Online Trends
The Psychology of Creativity
The Impact of Social Media on Hobbies
Balancing Online and Offline Creativity
Crafting for Relaxation vs. Productivity
The Evolution of Crafting
Personal Reflection & Growth Through Crafting
custom_fields.prerequisite_knowledge: No prior knowledge or experience is required.
custom_fields.relevance: Carnegie Mellon students are often overworked and constantly juggling academic and extracurricular demands. This course provides a structured space to explore crafting as a tool for mindfulness, stress relief, and creative expression. By integrating hands-on activities with discussions on digital trends and well-being, students will learn how crafting can support mental health and enhance overall student well-being.
custom_fields.learning_resources: Web pages, AI, anything available on the internet
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Around 2 hours of extra time commitments every week to complete homeworks and final crafting project.
